claim: Hunter S. Thompson was a journalist.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Hunter Stockton Thompson  (  July 18 , 1937 -- February 20 , 2005  )  was an American journalist and author , and the founder of the gonzo journalism movement .

claim: Hunter S. Thompson was a journalist.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Born in Louisville , Kentucky , to a middle-class family , Thompson had a turbulent youth after the death of his father left the family in poverty .

claim: Hunter S. Thompson was a journalist.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He traveled frequently , including stints in California , Puerto Rico , and Brazil , before settling in Aspen , Colorado , in the early 1960s .

claim: Hunter S. Thompson was a journalist.

claim: Hunter S. Thompson was a journalist.

claim: Hunter S. Thompson was a journalist.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Previously a relatively conventional journalist , with the publication in 1970 of The Kentucky Derby Is Decadent and Depraved he became a counter cultural figure , with his own brand of New Journalism which he termed `` Gonzo '' , an experimental style of journalism where reporters involve themselves in the action to such a degree that they become central figures of their stories .

claim: Hunter S. Thompson was a journalist.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The work he remains best known for , Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas : A Savage Journey to the Heart of the American Dream  (  1971  )  , constitutes a rumination on the failure of the 1960s counterculture movement .

claim: Hunter S. Thompson was a journalist.

claim: Hunter S. Thompson was a journalist.
